description: Detects cases in which a file gets renamed to .dll, which often happens to bypass perimeter protection
name: Rename Common File to DLL File
query: (file.path.text:*.dll AND (NOT ((OriginalFilename:(*.dll OR *.tmp) OR OriginalFilename:(*.dll.* OR *\\SquirrelTemp\\temp*)) OR (OriginalFilename:"") OR (NOT _exists_:OriginalFilename) OR (process.executable.text:C\:\\Windows\\WinSxS\\* AND process.executable.text:*\\TiWorker.exe) OR (process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\System32\\wuauclt.exe" OR file.path.text:C\:\\$WINDOWS.\~BT\\Sources\\*) OR (process.executable.text:(C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\*)))))
author: frack113
